name: Bushfire Rescue Tactics
description:
A bushfire rescue and firefighting tactics game to raise donations for Australian native wildlife protection.

Still being developed. Alpha version available.

Still to be completed:

  • Wombat Burrowing
  • Better instructions

All proceeds will be given to WIRES and Wildlife Victoria.

https://www.wires.org.au/donate/current-appeal

https://www.wildlifevictoria.org.au/donate/donate-to-wildlife-victoria
